thread.section_title: Print24 Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Print24 | print24.com
thread.title: A Heath

author: A Heath
title: A Heath
text:
We've just placed and received our first order with Print24, and were really happy with both the price and quality of the service.
We ordered 500 'while you were out' cards, and they arrived looking exactly as expected, well packaged and with a good finish to them. The price for the order also seemed very good value, and we were very pleased with the quality of product we received for the cost.
The delivery time was exactly as they had told us, and the turnaround time from submitting the artwork to being given a proof to approve was very fast.
Overall, we would definitely be interested in using Print24 again, and trying more of their products - we thought it was an excellent service!
